sensory_systems.name: Advanced LiDAR (Solid-State LiDAR)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution, solid-state LiDAR systems capable of 360-degree scanning with significantly improved range, resolution, and robustness compared to current rotating LiDAR. Utilizing MEMS technology and silicon photonics for miniaturization and reduced cost.

technical_specifications.range: Up to 500m at highway speeds, 200m in urban environments.
technical_specifications.weather_performance: Reliable operation in rain, snow, and fog (IP67 rated).

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: ± 1cm - 3cm positional accuracy in ideal conditions, ± 5cm - 10cm in adverse weather.

sensory_systems.name: Multi-Modal Radar (4D Radar)
sensory_systems.description: Advanced radar systems integrating multiple frequency bands (Ku-band, Ka-band, V-band) for enhanced object detection, velocity estimation, and tracking, particularly in challenging conditions.

technical_specifications.resolution: Multi-Doppler capability for precise velocity measurements.
technical_specifications.weather_performance: Robust performance in heavy rain, snow, and fog.

sensory_systems.name: Thermal Imaging Cameras
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution thermal cameras integrated for pedestrian and animal detection, particularly at night or in low-visibility conditions.

sensory_systems.name: Event Cameras
sensory_systems.description: Dynamic vision sensors that capture changes in brightness asynchronously, offering high temporal resolution and resilience to motion blur.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Dependent on specific application; excels at detecting rapid changes.

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) with Reinforcement Learning
control_systems.description: Advanced control algorithms utilizing MPC for trajectory planning and control, augmented with reinforcement learning for adaptation to complex and unpredictable environments.

control_systems.name: Centralized Vehicle-to-Everything (V2X) Communication
control_systems.description: High-bandwidth, low-latency communication system enabling direct communication between vehicles, infrastructure, and pedestrians.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Reliable data exchange for collision avoidance.

mechanical_systems.name: Compact Electric Drive Units
mechanical_systems.description: High-torque, lightweight electric motors and power electronics for efficient propulsion.

mechanical_systems.name: Advanced Suspension Systems (Active Suspension)
mechanical_systems.description: Adaptive suspension systems utilizing sensors and actuators to dynamically adjust ride height and damping characteristics.

software_integration.name: Sensor Fusion Framework
software_integration.description: Real-time framework for integrating data from multiple sensors using Kalman filters, Bayesian networks, and deep learning.

software_integration.name: Behavioral Planning & Prediction System
software_integration.description: AI-powered system for predicting the behavior of other road users and planning safe and efficient trajectories.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Prediction accuracy of other road users' actions.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: Real-time simulation environment mirroring the vehicle's state and environment for testing and validation.

timeline_estimate.2025: Level 4 automation in controlled environments (geofenced areas).
timeline_estimate.2030: Level 4 automation on highways and limited urban environments.
timeline_estimate.2035: Widespread Level 4 automation in urban environments.

key_research_areas: Robust Sensor Fusion in Adverse Weather
Human-Machine Interface (HMI) Design for Trust and Acceptance
